activation_code_page_text: Text: below We have sent a code to your email address. Change your email address.
activation_code_page_question: Did you not receive the code?
activation_code_page_help_info: Check your spam folder or click here to receive the activation code.
forgot_password_page_text: Text: Enter the email address or username associated with your account and we will send you a link to reset your password.
